name: DonkaBean
description:
"This game is absolutely *unbeanlievable*!" - Richard Bean, a bean.

Experience world-shattering character development and sit-at-the-edge-of-your-seat levels of engaging gameplay!

*Bleeding-edge graphical fidelity.

*Never before seen world-building.

*Simple and intuitive controls! Even your grandpa can play!

Controls! (Read carefully!!!)

AWSD - move.
